testcase.classname: To validate the signin functionality of the amazon application
testcase.name: To validate signin page with valid username and invalid password
testcase.system-out: Given To open the chrome browser and maximize the window to automate amazon sign in page.passed When To launch the amazon url of the application............................passed And user has to move the cursor to the Accounts and lists element...........passed And user has to click the signin button and navigate to the sign in page....passed And user has to pass the valid email id in the email textbox field..........passed And user has to click continue button and navigate to the next page.........passed And user has to pass the valid password in the password textbox field.......passed Then click the submit button to sign in.....................................passed
